value.title: Power BI Week Number (Weeknum) in Date Table #Q&A
value.excerpt: Week Numbers (Weeknum) in Power BI Date Table (Calendar Table) are extremely useful. Watch video to learn more and Download the Power BI file in Video at https://www.learnpowerbi.com/download   Week Numbers can allow you to show your data • Week over Week • Weekly Averages • Rolling Week Period …and

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.

value.title: Count of Unique Values DistinctCount in Power BI Through Power Query Group By Transformation
value.excerpt: You can have a distinct count calculation in multiple places in Power BI, through DAX code, using the Visual's aggregation on a field, or even in Power Query. If you are doing the distinct count in Power Query as part of a group by operation, however, the existing distinct count is for all columns in
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7l4dYEjmgqA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Extract Parts of a Text Value in Power BI using a Delimiter Power Query Transformation
value.excerpt: If you have a text field and you want to extract a part of that text field, there are multiple ways to do that. You can do this using the SUBSTRING function in DAX. However, These types of actions are better to be done using Power Query transformations. Fortunately, Power Query is very easy and simple

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Power BI Get Data from Google Sheets
value.excerpt: Power BI can get data from Google Sheet now. This functionality is released just yesterday and announced in both Power BI and Power Query blogs. value.title: Visualization Tip   Change to Filter instead of highlight   Control the Interaction in Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted. value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.

value.title: Price Prediction with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a machine learning price prediction using Python machine learning linear regression model and a dataset of 54,000 diamonds. This will be ported over to Power BI for a deeper level of interaction.  You can find the files and dataset here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Diamond-Price-Prediction

value.title: Sales Prediction Model with Python and Power BI
